dcterms:creator: Z. Ye
K. Wang
Y. Chen
X. Jiang
G. Song
dcterms:description: A cooperative task with 20 UAVs serving as mobile base stations to fly around a target region to provide communication services to the randomly distributed ground users.
dcterms:title: UAV-MBS

dcterms:creator: J. Jiang
C. Dun
T. Huang
Z. Lu
dcterms:description: A moral dilemma consisting of 100 agents and a limited amount of food. The agents should cooperate to explore a big map to discover the randomly refreshed food but then compete with each other to occupy the food as soon as possible to prevent starvation.
dcterms:title: Surviving

dcterms:creator: L. Zheng
J. Yang
H. Cai
M. Zhou
W. Zhang
J. Wang
Y. Yu
dcterms:description: Consists of 25 learnable predators and 50 pre-trained prey. The predators need to cooperate with nearby teammates to form several types of closure to lock their prey.
dcterms:title: Pursuit

dcterms:creator: S. Iqbal
F. Sha
dcterms:description: A heterogeneous environment with three types of agents: 20 hunter units that can collect red and blue treasure, and 10 red/blue bank units that can store the treasure of the corresponding color from the hunter.
dcterms:title: Cooperative Treasure Collection
